Article.ArticleTitle: Recovery of meteorological data for the observatory of A Guarda, Spain.

AbstractText: We herein describe the recovery of a series of data on temperature, humidity, precipitation, evaporation, wind, and local weather conditions from documentary sources obtained from the Jesuit observatory of A Guarda (Galicia, Spain) for the period 1881-1896. The data were digitized and made available in accessible electronic formats. Comparisons were made with present-day meteorological data obtained from two nearby stations. We further believe that the discovery of some new complementary documentary sources made during the present research could be a basis for future data recovery efforts. Among these new results, early ozone data from the period are of outstanding importance to meteorologists.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Smith School of Enterprise and the Environment, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom. juan.anel@smithschool.ox.ac.uk
